destinations.title: Wadi Rum, Jordan
destinations.details: Wadi Rum is a protected desert wilderness in southern Jordan known for its dramatic sandstone mountains, narrow canyons, and ancient petroglyphs. It offers eco-friendly camping and hiking opportunities.

destinations.title: Dana Biosphere Reserve, Jordan
destinations.details: Dana Biosphere Reserve is a nature reserve in Jordan that features a variety of ecosystems, including mountains, canyons, and desert. It's an excellent destination for eco-conscious travelers.

destinations.title: Masada, Palestine
destinations.details: Masada is an ancient fortress in Israel perched atop a dramatic plateau overlooking the Dead Sea. It offers a glimpse into history and stunning views of the surrounding landscape.

destinations.title: Dead Sea, Jordan
destinations.details: The Dead Sea is a unique saltwater lake known for its high salinity and healing properties. Travelers can enjoy floating in the mineral-rich waters while taking in the beautiful surroundings.

destinations.title: Petra, Jordan
destinations.details: Petra is a famous archaeological site in Jordan, known for its rock-cut architecture and ancient history. It's a must-visit destination for those interested in history and culture.

destinations.title: Costa Rica Rainforests, Costa Rica
destinations.details: Costa Rica is known for its lush rainforests and diverse wildlife. Visitors can explore eco-friendly lodges, go hiking, and experience the rich biodiversity of the rainforest.

destinations.title: Galápagos Islands, Ecuador
destinations.details: The Galápagos Islands are a UNESCO World Heritage site famous for their unique wildlife. Travelers can take eco-friendly cruises and guided tours to observe the amazing flora and fauna.

destinations.title: Bhutan, Land of Gross National Happiness
destinations.details: Bhutan, with its focus on Gross National Happiness, is a leader in sustainable tourism. Explore the Himalayan kingdom, experience its rich culture, and enjoy stunning mountain landscapes.

destinations.title: Borneo Rainforest, Malaysia
destinations.details: Borneo is home to some of the world's oldest rainforests and diverse wildlife, including orangutans. Eco-tourism options include jungle treks and wildlife conservation programs.

destinations.title: Aoraki / Mount Cook National Park, New Zealand
destinations.details: Aoraki / Mount Cook National Park offers stunning alpine landscapes, glaciers, and pristine lakes. It's a great place for eco-friendly hiking and stargazing.

destinations.title: Torres del Paine National Park, Chile
destinations.details: Torres del Paine is a Chilean national park known for its dramatic granite peaks, glaciers, and pristine lakes. Visitors can explore the park through eco-friendly treks and wildlife viewing.

destinations.title: Santorini, Greece
destinations.details: Santorini is a picturesque island in the Aegean Sea with stunning sunsets and unique architecture. It offers sustainable tourism options, including eco-lodges and organic vineyards.

destinations.title: Tongariro Alpine Crossing, New Zealand
destinations.details: The Tongariro Alpine Crossing is a famous one-day hike through volcanic terrain in New Zealand. It provides a thrilling and eco-friendly adventure with breathtaking landscapes.

destinations.title: Aletsch Glacier, Switzerland
destinations.details: Aletsch Glacier is the largest glacier in the Alps, and it's a UNESCO World Heritage site. Visitors can explore this natural wonder through eco-conscious guided tours.

destinations.title: Machu Picchu, Peru
destinations.details: Machu Picchu is an ancient Inca citadel nestled in the Andes Mountains. Sustainable travel options include guided treks like the Inca Trail with an emphasis on preserving the site.
